Switch to Internxt for a fully private alternative to Degoo. Post-quantum and

HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs Degoo cloud storage overview
HeaderSection.description: Discover the key features and differences that allow Internxt to give you back control over your data.

internxtFeatures: Competitive, no hidden costs, up to 5TB
Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more
GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, SOC 2 compliant, based in Spain
competitorFeatures: Files stored outside the Vault are less private

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Degoo lacks transparency. Internxt protects your privacy.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Degoo keeps its source code hidden and has no published security audits. Switch to Internxt for full security and transparency for your files, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: Degoo keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency, there is no way to know for sure how Degoo handles or protects your data.
Unlike Internxt, Degoo has not published any independent security audits, leaving users uncertain about the security of their platform.

Many Degoo users have reported their accounts being deleted without warning, causing them to lose access to files they trusted were safe in the cloud. Sudden deletion highlights a lack of reliable data governance.
With Degoo cloud storage, privacy becomes a paid feature rather than a basic right. Zero-knowledge encryption is only available with paid plans, leaving files on a free plan less secure and at risk.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Degoo alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Degoo demonstrates in basic security fails in terms of privacy and transparency. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption from Internxt.

descriptions: Degoo's free plans lack zero-knowledge encryption, meaning your files are less private. At Internxt, all plans include zero-knowledge encryption with no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors. Internxt can't read your files, so your photos, documents, and videos remain private.

With Degoo, zero-knowledge encryption is only available with paid plans, leaving free users exposed. Internxt provides post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption for all users, including free accounts, ensuring your data is always protected.

Many users report Degoo deleting accounts without warning, resulting in permanent data loss. Internxt provides reliable cloud storage with transparent policies, regular audits, and customer support to ensure your files are safe and accessible.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs Degoo
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unparalleled security with features that Degoo can't match, such as zero-knowledge encryption for all plans, post-quantum encryption, and open-source transparency.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine and ensure its security via our GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it. Available for all plans, including free.

features.title: Audited & compliant
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{percentage}}% off.

features.title: Closed source
features.description: Degoo keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how Degoo handles or protects your data.

features.title: Paid privacy feature
features.description: Zero-knowledge encryption is only available with paid plans, leaving files on a free plan less secure and at risk of being deleted.

features.title: No published audits
features.description: Degoo has not published any independent security audits, unlike Internxt which undergoes regular external audits.

features.title: Subscription based
features.description: Monthly subscriptions only. No lifetime or annual plans available.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: The best alternative to Degoo is Internxt
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions:
Internxt Drive comes with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so nobody but you can access your files. Get encrypted cloud storage and backups for your photos, videos, and files. 

 Plus, encrypted backups and password-protected file sharing offer maximum protection against ransomware and data breaches.

Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your Internxt Drive app for full control and protection against malware. Run full or custom virus scans to keep your device running smoothly and protected against viruses such as ransomware or spyware.
Internxt's VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private. Encrypt your wifi connection to prevent spying, hackers, and identity theft.

Internxt Cleaner helps you identify, eliminate, and manage unwanted junk or duplicate files from your device. With Cleaner, you can delete unwanted files to keep your storage organized, free from clutter, and ensure your device runs efficiently.

Internxt Meet is also available as your secure and private alternative to video conferencing. With Meet, you can host private video calls free from trackers, ads, and data collection. Your video calls are protected with post-quantum encryption.
Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile. For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

CtaSection.title: Choose Internxt for the best Degoo alternative
CtaSection.description: Internxt gives you full private encryption by default, transparent open source software, and a full privacy suite to keep your data and files secure online.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure alternative to Degoo?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. All your files are protected with this encryption, even on a free account.

Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, NAS support, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches as part of your cloud storage plan with Internxt.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative to Degoo cloud storage.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Or purchase a new plan at internxt.com/pricing with your current Internxt account, and your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Yes, Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
